name: BallShooterVR
description:
Look around and press on the screen to blast balls

Coose between gamemode:

  1. Easy: Ball Spawn every 1 secondes
  2. Meduim: Ball spawn every 0.75 secondes
  3. Hard: Ball spawn every 0.5 secondes
  4. Extreme: Balls came from two directions
  5. Dark: The room is dark and you have one flashlight
